entry.title: Ozempic, Wegovy and Mounjaro Spark a Weight-Loss and Diet Industry Identity Crisis
entry.content: Weight-loss businesses, which long pushed calorie-counting and willpower, are grappling with the surging popularity of new drugs.

entry.title: Ukraine Says Russia Uses 'Scorched Earth' Tactics in Bakhmut
entry.content: A top Ukrainian military commander described the situation in the city, where Ukrainian forces have been largely pushed out of its center, as “difficult but under control.”
